yaml.title: Macroeconomic Laws 1
yaml.subtitle: This paper derives basic micro and macroeconomic laws that will help anyone understand the causal relationships present in all economic systems, and their deterministic nature as well as the general difficulty in estimating them accurately, which makes economic statistics tampering easy, as well as how to get around that dilemma.
yaml.author: Yuuki

markdown.headingText: The inability of a country to go bust
